SEARCH

Package simu.framework

package simu.framework
  • Class
    Description
    ArrivalProcess
    The ArrivalProcess class is responsible for generating arrival events based on a given continuous distribution generator.
    ArrivalTimeGenerator
    Generates arrival times for simulation events.
    Clock
    The Clock class serves as a singleton clock that keeps track of the current simulation time.
    Engine
    The Engine class represents the abstract base class for all engines that drive the simulation.
    Engine.ConcreteEngine
    A concrete implementation of the Engine class using the MyEngine model.
    Event
    The Event class represents a simulation event with a specific type and time.
    EventList
    The EventList class manages a list of events in a priority queue, ordered by event time.
    IEngine
    The IEngine interface defines the contract for a simulation engine.
    IEventType
    The IEventType interface serves as a marker interface for event types in the simulation framework.
    Trace
    The Trace class provides a simple logging mechanism with different trace levels.
    Trace.Level
    Enum representing the different logging levels.
